<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Black Scorpion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=796)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

With a carapace the color of polished obsidian and a penchant for attacking villages, this humongous scorpion is one of the desert's most frightening predators. A black scorpion measures 60 feet from tip to the base of its stinger.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +27; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense (imprecise) 90 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** -5

**Wis** +6

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 38 

**Fort** +29 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +25 

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pincer +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+15 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +30 ([reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+15 piercing plus black scorpion venom

**Black Scorpion Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 36 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d12 poison damage and [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d12 poison damage, clumsy 2, and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 round); **Stage 3** 4d12 poison damage, clumsy 4, and slowed 2 (1 round)

**[Greater Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=19)** <actions string="Single Action" />  2d12+12 bludgeoning, DC 36

**Rapid Stinging** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The black scorpion makes three stinger Strikes, each against a different target. Its multiple attack penalty applies to each attack, but the penalty increases only after all the attacks have been made.

</column>
